titles.title: Federal Building Moratorium Act of 1993
A bill to establish a 2-year moratorium on construction and leasing of space by the Federal Government, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6450-6452)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9582-9583)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1350-1351)

bill.summary: 5/25/1993--Introduced. Federal Building Moratorium Act of 1993 - Establishes a moratorium on construction of new buildings and leasing of building space by the Federal Government, with certain exceptions. Allows the President to waive such moratorium for purposes of national security and other specified reasons.
